title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Remote Laparoscopic Surgery Skills Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: For five types of laparoscopic surgery simulation tasks, achieve proficiency benchmarks based on given criteria (cutoff time – actual time – (K×error count)).
Submit surgical technique videos recorded with a smartphone via a remote submission system following the specified procedure.
Achieve accuracy within 2 standard deviations of the expert average score in three consecutive performance tests

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
